item.title: Adding OAuth Validation to Release Checks
item.description: Teams shipping MCP integrations are beginning to add AuthProbe scans to release readiness checks. The goal is straightforward: detect OAuth breakpoints early and verify remediations with confidence.

item.title: What We Learned from Early AuthProbe Scans
item.description: In early usage, teams moved faster when they could pinpoint exactly where MCP OAuth failed. AuthProbe’s deterministic findings and verification commands reduced time spent reproducing issues.
